title: Bug 114470[Smoke] Error message throws when using new Date('3/2/2005') as value in table filter.
description: Error message throws when using new Date('3/2/2005') as value in table filter.
OB: When attempting to use the value new Date('3/2/2005') in a table filter, an error message is thrown.
EB: The table filter should accept the value new Date('3/2/2005') without throwing an error message.
SR: 1. Open the table filter.2. Enter 'new Date('3/2/2005')' as the filter value.3. Apply the filter.4. Observe if an error message is thrown when using the value new Date('3/2/2005').
